original_text: To them were given Shechem, the city of refuge for the manslayer, with its pasturelands in the hill country of Ephraim, Gezer with its pasturelands,
korean_text: 곧 살인자의 도피성 에브라임 산지 세겜과 그 목초지이요 또 게셀과 그 목초지와

sentences.original_text: the city of refuge for the manslayer,
with its pasturelands in the hill country of Ephraim,
sentences.korean_translation: 에브라임 산지에 있는 그 목초지와 함께
